scripts.deploy: graph auth --product hosted-service c7eb11d1b9d59cd2ef3f6c0935c43803 && graph deploy --product hosted-service ensocean/ensocean-subgraph
scripts.setup-remote: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn deploy
scripts.deploy-local: graph deploy ensocean/ensocean-subgraph --debug --node http://graph-local.ensocean.com/ --ipfs http://ipfs-local.ensocean.com --version-label 0.0.1 --network goerli
scripts.setup-local: yarn codegen-local && yarn build-local  && yarn remove-local && yarn create-local && yarn deploy-local
scripts.deploy-test: graph deploy ensocean-subgraph-2 --debug --node https://graph-test.ensocean.com/ --ipfs https://ipfs-test.ensocean.com --version-label 0.0.1 --network goerli

scripts.deploy-prod: graph deploy ensocean-subgraph-2 --debug --node https://graph.ensocean.com/ --ipfs https://ipfs.ensocean.com --version-label 0.0.1 --network mainnet
scripts.setup-prod: yarn codegen-prod && yarn build-prod  && yarn remove-prod && yarn create-prod && yarn deploy-prod
